name: Fragile (itch)
description:
A 2D point and click adventure about a little boy who is trying to fix his family photoframe. The game is made in the Adventure Game Studio engine. How to play: - Use your mouse to interact with objects and characters. - Mouse click to speed through the dialogue.

Installation Instructions: 

Download the Peanut Panda - Fragile - GGJ2020 Executable.zip file and unpack it. Click on the GGJ20.exe file to start the game. For Windows only!!

Credits: 

Art, Design & Scripting: Cherilyn Uktolseja

Sound Effects: freesound.org

Background Music: Chad Crouch - The Spring
